item.title: symfony
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I’m playing with symfony now, will try to build up a album application first. Ubuntu comes with 1.0, and seems things changed some (at least those admin commands) in v1.2, but I don’t think it matters too much. I’m working on home Ubuntu box and will move the application to the hosting server after tests.
item.content:encoded:
I’m playing with symfony now, will try to build up a album application first.

Ubuntu comes with 1.0, and seems things changed some (at least those admin commands) in v1.2, but I don’t think it matters too much.

I’m working on home Ubuntu box and will move the application to the hosting server after tests.
